Provides a platform-independent means of representing all pertinent data in a sonar range reading. More...

Detailed Description

Provides a platform-independent means of representing all pertinent data in a sonar range reading.

SonarReading::SonarReading (  char *  line  ) 
 

Initializes with the given sonar log data string.

Uses strtok() to parse the line, so line will be modified.

Parameters:

Member Function Documentation

void SonarReading::initRanges (  const int *  a  ) 
 

Initializes all sonar range readings to those values in the given array.

If a is NULL, range readings are initialized to 0.
